text: Mor Polycarpose Zacharias is the Metropolitan of Malabar Diocese of Malankara Jacobite Syriac Orthodox Church. He serves on the advisory boards of various educational institutions including St Mary's College Meenangadi, St Peter's & St Paul's English Medium School and Aramaia International Residential School. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Syriac Orthodox Church bishops Category:Indian Oriental Orthodox Christians
title: Polycarpose Zacharias
